Ð¡Ð˜Ð¡Ð¢Ð•ÐœÐ Ð Ð•ÐŸÐžÐ Ð¢ÐžÐ’ ÐŸÐ ÐžÐ¡Ð¢Ðž ÐÐ• Ð ÐÐ‘ÐÐ¢ÐÐ•Ð¢ (Ð¿Ð¾ÑÑ‚Ð¾ÑÐ½Ð½Ð¾ Ð¿Ð¾Ð¿Ð°Ð´Ð°ÑŽÑ‚ÑÑ Ð¸Ð³Ñ€Ð¾ÐºÐ¸, ÐºÐ¾Ñ‚Ð¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ðµ Ð½Ð°Ð¼ÐµÑ€ÐµÐ½Ð½Ð¾ ÑÐ»Ð¸Ð²Ð°ÑŽÑ‚ Ð¸Ð³Ñ€Ñƒ, Ñ€Ð°Ð´Ð¸ Ð¾Ñ‡ÐºÐ¾Ð² Ð¸ ÐºÐ°Ñ€Ñ‚ÐµÐ»ÑŒÐ½Ð¾Ð³Ð¾ ÑÐ³Ð¾Ð²Ð¾Ñ€Ð° Ñ Ð¼Ð°Ð½ÑŒÑÐºÐ¾Ð¼ ÑÐ´ÐµÐ»Ð°Ð¹Ñ‚Ðµ ÑƒÐ¶Ðµ Ñ‡Ñ‚Ð¾ Ñ‚Ð¾ Ñ ÑÑ‚Ð¸Ð¼)

Beyond toxic, but hey, its a fun time.

After putting in over 1,000 hours I decided to make a review.  While the game itself is fun that's the only positive quality.  The people who play this game on both survivor and killer end are toxic to the point where it's not enjoyable.  I don't mean in game with flashlights, tea bagging, body blocking, etc.  I can handle that, I don't care.  But when someone jumps on you at end game in chat and is ripping into just because they died in a video game it makes the entire thing not enjoyable.  It's a video game and yet everyone in this "community" acts like it's the only thing that matters to them in life.  I'd be better if they just removed any form of chat/communication.  Sure, there are some nice survivors, some nice killers, some okay people.  But the majority outweigh the bad.  2% are decent people that know it's just a game while 98% wanna slit your throat because you didn't save them or you tunneled them.  I can't give it a recommendation because I wouldn't want to put my friends or strangers through verbal berating/abuse that the vast majority always does.  If you ever wanna play as survivor make sure it's 4 man with all your friends or if you're killer, leave as soon as the game ends.  Because the people, this "community" ruins the game right into the ground and can never be happy with what the devs do.  Honestly? Frick this "community", it's not even that.  Just the world gathering of people who are cowards in real life but wanna act like top teir crap in this game.

At the beggining of playing the game its a little difficult. but after a while and you've gotten most of what you want for your survivor or killer it starts to get fun. so my advice for this game is to play it for at least 30 hours before completely giving up.
PLZ BUY THIS GAME I HATE WAITING FOR 30 MINS PLZZZZZZ
I really like this game, but some killers is OP and I want this game to become more popular, btw its a toxic community, but the best community =))

Edit: I play killer 80% of time.

Game can be fun if you have a very clear mindset and you don't get mad at games. 
The game is heavily catered to the survivors side, and you will find tons of suvivors that make the "Survivors handbook". 

Don't follow their rules. It wouldn't make sense for a killer to go easy would it? Just ignore whatever they say and play whatever makes you have fun. 

DBD does require a small amount of research but rank 20 - 10 is pretty casual and what you build doesn't matter.

My biggest cons: A few hackers and I wish you could do something while waiting for queue because the queue times are just bonkers man.

Anyway, gl:hf, don't be toxic.

good soup

What I dislike about this game is that we are not allowed to link our accounts. I have been playing Dead By Daylight on PS4 for a while and put a lot of money and time into it but decided to switch to PC because of the extremely long matchmaking times for PS4. I am very disappointed that I will have to put into more money to buy DLC's that I have already bought.

10/10 would recommend it to anyone who want to play it with their friend.

+pretty scary and there's absolutely no jump scare (except for nurse, she could blink right into your face).
+so fun to play (because the ghost(killer) are also a player so you could trick them in game).
++more fun if you play it with your friend just like what i said at the top, you could play a trick to the killer and make him rage quit lol (please don't do this, the killer also have a heart).

-for an adrenaline hunter who like to play horror game at 2 AM this game is kinda sucks since no one play this game at that time.

I was pleasantly surprised but how much fun this is. The interactions and game mechanics are such that both side can benefit so even loosing has it's rewards. This has become one of my favorite games.
